about_the_game:
Our team of devilishly talented composers have crafted a spine-chilling score that will have you headbanging and moshing with demons! From the bone-rattling bass lines to the scorching guitar solos, this soundtrack will have you saying "Hail Satan" in no time!

By buying this soundtrack you will:
1. Support the devs and composers!
2. Descend into the fiery depths of the Bloody Hell Soundtrack!

Composed by Stef Duijkers & Nick de Haas.
